titles.title: To enhance border security in the vicinity of San Diego, California through the construction and improvement of physical barriers at the United States border and through the forward deployment of Border Patrol agents to the border.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 5/17/1995--Introduced. Provides for the construction of barriers and vehicle access roads along the U.S. border and the temporary forward deployment of Border Patrol Agents in the San Diego, California, area. Authorizes appropriations.
